refnamediv.refpurpose: Receive data over TCP/IP from specified remote machine

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The TCP Recv block configures and opens an interface to a specified remote address using the TCP/IP protocol. The configuration and initialization occur once at the start of the model's execution. During the model's run time, the block acquires data either in blocking mode or nonblocking mode. 'Port' is remote port on the remote machine you need to connect to. The default port value is 80. Valid port values are 1 to 65535.

member.para: output(1) - data from remote TCP host
